description:
Yuma hunts down a photographer whose pictures can predict the future!  Unfortunately for Yuma and his friend Tori, it’s a future that’s not so bright!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shougeki no Scoop! Kotori no Kiken na Mirai
The Shocking Scoop, Kotori`s Dangerous Future!
衝撃のスクープ! 小鳥の危険な未来
